trans-unit.source: django-inline-media allows insertion of inline media in text fields. Based on django-basic-apps/inlines, comes with two models, Picture and PictureSet. It uses sorl.thumbnail, django-taggit and the jquery plugin prettyPhoto. See it in action running the demo projects.
trans-unit.target: django-inline-media允许在文本字段中插入内联媒体。基于django-basic-apps/inline,自带Picture和PictureSet两个模型。它使用了sorl.thumbnail、django-taggit和jquery插件prettyPhoto。在运行演示项目时,可以看到它的实际运行情况。

trans-unit.source: django-inline-media allows insertion of inline media objects in text fields.
trans-unit.target: django-inline-media允许在文本字段中插入内联媒体对象。
